title: I have scored 423 in the 12th CBSE board (science group). What course can I prefer? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India Advice
Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: Heyy…even i sae my results of 12th science today…. So as you’re in science stream you’ve many many options ahead.. If PCM, and if you’re a competitive person check out your ability in mock tests[For JEE]but if you donot want this there are many other courses than engineering Ex. Bsc then Msc, other lines like bba,bcom,etc. Infact if you’re not well prepared you can take a drop to prepare for entrances
